Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
21 Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika
Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika
28.
78Hetuṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
79Hetuṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
